code: import React from'react';import'./StatusBadge.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatusBadge=_ref=>{let{status}=_ref;const getStatusClass=status=>{if(!status)return'status-unknown';const statusLower=status.toLowerCase();if(statusLower.includes('approved'))return'status-approved';if(statusLower.includes('review'))return'status-review';if(statusLower.includes('rejected'))return'status-rejected';return'status-default';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"status-badge ".concat(getStatusClass(status)),children:status||'Unknown'});};export default StatusBadge;
